# sessionIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier of the session that owns this anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
var sessionIdentifier: UUID? { get }
```

## Discussion

ARKit sets this property when a user first adds an anchor to a session. In multiuser experiences, use this ID to identify the user that created the anchor.

## Tracking Anchors

- **identifier**: A unique identifier for the anchor.
- **transform**: A matrix encoding the position, orientation, and scale of the anchor relative to the world coordinate space of the AR session the anchor is placed in.
